title: God fist lee sin skin and God fist Bundle
body:
Hello

For the new skin with lee sin ,It's cheating customer behavior.

How can for one new skin god fist lee sin , the price is 1820RP , but for the Bundle is only 731RP.

When i bought the new skin God fist lee sin , i just found it Bundle is more cheaper.

How could that make sense !!!

Could you please can me more Refunds change again?

I feel really bad , i already spend a lot of money for RP .

Thank you for check is e-mail. I glad to spend more money and more time in league of legends , thank you

replies.body:
Basically what Broporo says: 
http://i.imgur.com/E5WTK8U.png

As you can see, for me the bundle is 731 RP more expensive than the skin itself. As you've bought the skin, 1820 RP is subtracted from the bundle price, leaving you with 731 RP to buy all the icons with.

You didn't actually get swindled out of money. :x
Why'e you complaining lol its cheaper

Bundle prices are discounted based on what items you already own. For instance, the god fist lee sin bundle can be a cheaper price if you already own the champion and icons, but just not the skin. That bundle price is the discounted price that you are seeing, not the normal price.
